RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 85. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TENSAS ALL OURS in the second flight off the inside, moved closer into the far turn, idled along through most of that bend, dropped to the rail turning for home, took over, drew clear under a single right handed crop past the furlong marker and stayed comfortably clear to the wire under a steady hand ride to win ridden out. CHICKEN TRUCK lacked early foot, began to advance three wide early in the far turn, continued willingly to the wire to be up late for the place, not a threat to the winner. ZULTAN broke on top, showed the way into and through the first turn in the two path, continued to set a relaxed pace up the backstretch and into the far turn, got out a bit late in that bend allowing the winner a sizable opening into the straight, chased that one past the furlong marker, weakened a bit and was caught late for the second spot. MONARCH MAN broke back, moved up to race in mid pack inside of several rivals into the first turn, continued to save ground, improved into the straight then flattened out the final furlong to lose a position or tow. CRIMSON STORM in the main body off the inside, four to five wide second turn, went evenly through the stretch in lacking a closing response. MOR BIG LEE restless gate, void of speed for six furlongs, improved a bit off the inside into the lane, never dangerous. SCORING DRIVE lacked speed outside, five wide into the stretch, failed to muster a rally. BIG ACE prompted the pace for six furlongs, lodged a brief bid late in the final turn then gave way through the stretch. VETERAN'S HOLIDAY broke sluggishly, remained always back. MERCI within striking distance inside, shortened stride second turn, pulled up in apparent distress upper stretch, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Merci
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance inside, gave way, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Monarch Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up inside, improved into lane, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Veteran's Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sluggishly, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Tensas All Ours
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight off rail,dropped inside into lane,took over,riddn out

ENTRY.NAME: Zultan
ENTRY.COMMENT: relaxed pace off rail, rated, caught late 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body, 4-5w 2nd turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Big Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, brief bid, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Scoring Drive
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 5w 1/4, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Mor Big Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, improved a bit off the inside, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Chicken Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, advanced 3w 2nd turn, willingly, up late 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since June 4, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIKEN IT broke thru gate prior to the start, broke on top, dueled in the run up the backstretch, edged clear by late in the turn, extended that advantage past the furlong marker before holding the runner up wafe late. GOLDEN PALACE with pace out of the chute, dueled outside the winner from midway up the backstretch into the far turn, fell back off that one into the lane, chased that one pace the furlong marker then was coming back on that one a bit late. IN THE ARCH off a step slow, raced back for five furlongs while three wide through the turn, rallied from between horses to earn the show, no real threat to the top pair. TURN ON THE MAGIC in mid pack just off the inside, asked along midway on the turn, went evenly through the lane in lacking a meaningful response. BOYFRIEND MATERIAL off the pace outside, came five wide out of the turn, went one paced to the wire to also be found wanting. OVERTAXED forwardly placed off rail, four wide turning for home, tired. B W P SPECIAL raced inside, shuffled while continuing to save ground turn, remained back when clear for the drive. MARKITOFF finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, shuffled turn, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Liken It
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate,brk well,dueled early inside,shook clear, held late

ENTRY.NAME: In the Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, raced back, 3w through the turn, rallied btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Markitoff
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early off rail, fell back, coming again late

ENTRY.NAME: Overtaxed
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 4w into lane, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Turn On the Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, asked mid turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Boyfriend Material
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace outside, 5w into lane, one paced to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 66. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOLATETOOWAIT broke alertly, helped show the way into the first turn between horses, held a narrow advantage onto the backstretch while under a snug hold, soft fractions, clear second turn, drew out upper stretch, remained comfortably clear the final furlong while being kept to task with a steady right handed crop. HONEST ANGUS back off the early leaders under restraint, moved closer before a half, chased the winner through the final turn, proved no match through the lane, held sway for the runner up spot. AVENDORE fell back to trail after the start, moved closer while improving along the inside through the second turn, slowly getting to the runner up late. GEAUX VOTE within striking distance for six furlongs, came up empty for the stretch drive, outkicked for the show. PLANTS AND BIRDS settled off that soft pace, lacked a serious bid as well when the real running began at the head of the lane. CALIFORNIA CALI failed to menace. LUCKY HARBORAGE broke back, moved up to be forwardly placed on the outside into the first turn, raced keenly through that bend when forcing the issue, began to fade after five furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Geaux Vote
ENTRY.OWNER: The Peach Pit LLC and Abbott Barbara
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, came up empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Avendore
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, closer inside, finished up best rest

ENTRY.NAME: California Cali
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Honest Angus
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, closer before a half, chased, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Tolatetoowait
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, soft pace inside, plenty left

ENTRY.NAME: Plants and Birds
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Harborage
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up, forward, keen early outside, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 4, 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTS OF TIME behind the first flight in the run up the backstretch, moved out and ranged up four wide to challenge midway on the turn, took over into the stretch, steadily increased advantage past the furlong marker, stayed clear to the wire under steady handling. QUANA DUDE back off the pace and the inside, five wide exiting the turn when beginning to advance, slowly getting to the winner late. GALLANT STAR in mid pack while racing outside, four wide and inside the runner up entering the stretch, could not match that one late, clearly best of the others. GENIUS forwardly placed while three wide, remaining within striking distance exiting the turn, had little left in the run to the wire. GRAND PRADO broke alertly, set or forced the pace four over a half closest to the inside, also faltered in the drive. PERFECT PERIGEE last away, trailed, moved well wide, five wide exiting the turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while not a threat. IRISH EXPECTATIONS with the pace early pace while between foes, began to falter before a half. CROQUE MONSIEUR (GB) broke back and failed to menace. BUNKIE'S SONG steadily faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Mists of Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind first flight, ranged up 4w bid, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Croque Monsieur (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back and did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Perigee
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, 5w into lane, passed tiring ones

ENTRY.NAME: Quana Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 5w into lane, slowly getting winner

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Prado
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set or forced pace for a half inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Expectations
ENTRY.COMMENT: with early pace between foes, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Genius
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3w, little left late

ENTRY.NAME: Bunkie's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadily faded

ENTRY.NAME: Gallant Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, 4w into lane, not enough 2nd, clear rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 78. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 4, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $7, 500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AFLEET ASCENT lacked early foot off the inside, encountered a bit of traffic early in the turn, two path into the stretch when beginning to rally, was moving smartly when forced to alter course in some traffic with a sixteenth to run, continued to close with good resolve to be up in time. FIREINTHESTORM with the pace off the inside, held a narrow advantage between horses into the stretch, headed upper straight, battled on to regain a narrow advantage past the furlong marker and proved game to the end. BANKROLL moved up to contest the pace along the inside, continued to vie turn, led upper, also gave ground grudgingly in the final strides. MUCHO MARVIN back off the issue in the run up the backstretch inside, continued to save ground turn, closer along the rail into the straight, flattened out the final furlong to finish up evenly. ONE TOUGH CHARLIE behind the lead pack backstretch, two path through the early part of the turn, angled four wide into the stretch, continued evenly through the stretch. MAD GOLD in the main body outside, five wide turning into the straight, also lacked a closing kick. MIDNIGHT BAYOU pressed the pace up front outside, four wide through the turn, weakened in the drive. RAP ARTIST away in good order, set or forced the pace for three furlongs between horses, gave way late in the turn. M AND M'S CUSTOM lacked speed, failed to rally. MR. PRIORITY broke back ,and failed to menace. CHIMNEY ROCK last away, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Bankroll
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace inside, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: One Tough Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p behind pace, swung 4w into lane, evenly final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Marvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace inside, closer upper, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet Ascent
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, bit of traffic 3/8, rallied, altered late, up

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Mad Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body outside, five wide into the lane, lacked kick

ENTRY.NAME: Rap Artist
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, pace btwn, gave way late turn

ENTRY.NAME: Chimney Rock
ENTRY.OWNER: Brandon Theodore Clear Creek Stud LLC and Ducoing Sturges J
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: M and M's Custom
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Fireinthestorm
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace, narrow lead, headed, regained, stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace four wide, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAYDYN CAT broke out to carry STAND BY TIME OUT, was straightened to race close up front the start outside, continued to vie three wide through the turn, disposed of the other speed when straightened for home, well clear, steady handling. ONE LINE RULER broke well from along the inside, narrowly set the early pace, continued to hold a slight advantage late in the turn along the inside, fell back off the winner upper stretch, lugged in a bid soon after, no match, held the place. LIGHTOFMAINE forwardly placed behind the first flight just off the inside, set down drive, slowly getting to the runner up late, clear of the others. BUCKSKIN JERRY broke through the gate prior to the start, away in good order, setteled in the second flight just off the inside, lacked a late punch. COAL DANCER bothered, off slowly to be last away, back early, improved along the inside through the turn, continued with mild interest through the stretch. DARK SKYER settled off the pace, roused three wide turning into the stretch, continued one paced to the wire. BELLAMYSAWESOMEDAY broke in, raced in mid pack after straightened, lacked serious bid. C C LLAM in tight at the start, remained back in failing to menace. STAND BY TIME carried out at the start, remained back. ASTROLOGY GIRL broke in to bother C C LLAM, was straightened to force the issue up front, weakened from between foes entering the stretch. MY IDEA remain always back to be outrun. COSTA LADY trailed throughout in showing little.

ENTRY.NAME: One Line Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well inside,narrowly set pace,fell back,lugged bit,held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Lightofmaine
ENTRY.OWNER: Harrington Maury and Harrington Christopher K
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance just off inside, gaining 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Skyer
ENTRY.OWNER: Stumpf Donna and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, 3w into lane, roused, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Coal Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered, last away,improved inside turn, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Bellamysawesomeday
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, mid pack, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Buckskin Jerry
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke thru gate, 2nd flight, lacked late punch

ENTRY.NAME: Costa Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: My Idea
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back to be outrun

ENTRY.NAME: C C Llam
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Astrology Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bothered foe, pressed, weakened drive

ENTRY.NAME: Jaydyn Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, close up, vied 3w thru turn, shook clear upper

ENTRY.NAME: Stand by Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out break remained back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 94. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALW. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Rac e Since June 4, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OCELOT prompted the leader from along the inside first turn, fell back under restraint onto the backstretch, crept a bit closer along the rail under continued patient handling far turn, rail bid into the lane, shook clear by a furlong out and maintained daylight to the wire under steady handling. TOUCHDOWN JOE showed the way through the first turn in the two path, set a pressured pace the middle half, allowed the winner the inside turning for home, fell back off that one, drifted out midstretch stretch but stayed on after being straightened to be clearly second best. DEER CROSSING last away, raced back off the pace outside and four wide first turn, loomed a brief threat four wide late in the final turn, lost considerable ground to the winner into the lane and flattened out upper stretch, came back for the show. PLAY MO settled off the pace and the inside, lost some position in some traffic while three wide late in the final turn, between foes past the furlong marker, improved, missed the show with some continued late interest. TAMBOURINE STAR forwardly placed early, two path and outside the winner late in the final turn, came up empty for the stretch run. PAYNT BATTLE lacked speed, failed to serious menace. IBERIAN RUNNER stalked the pace while three wide, lodged a brief bid three wide and outside the runnerup late in the final turn then faltered in the drive. MUFFIN NUTS remained back throughout in failing to make an impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Ocelot
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed inside, patient, inside bid, kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: Muffin Nuts
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Touchdown Joe
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace 2p early, pressured middle half, headed, drifted, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Tambourine Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, came up empty for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Play Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, traffic 3w 1/4, improved, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Iberian Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3w, bid late 2nd, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Crossing
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, back off pace 4w, loomed four wide 1/4,stalled,up 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 37000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winner s Of A Race Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since June 4, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOX OF PICTURES broke with the field, raced back off the pace and the inside, moved closer four wide late in the turn, chased the leader past the furlong marker, late surge to collar that one late. BLESSED ASSURANCE lacked speed off the rail, roused four wide out of the turn, also turned in late run and was up in the final strides for the place. MAESTRIA bumped and was off slowly, was used to move up to contest the pace inside, continued to vie along the rail through the turn, shook clear when straightened for home only to weaken late late to be caught by the top two. SIENNA BREEZE broke sharp, with the pace between horses, weakened. COUNTRY LADY unprepared for the start while detained, broke in a tangle and was steadied, moved up to contest the pace three wide and outside, also faltered in the drive. CATCAKE broke back, failed to menace. AKIANE'S SOLDIER bumped with MAESTRIA at the break, trailed and was never a factor. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE START, COUNTRY LADY WAS DECLARED A NON STARTER DUE TO AN UNFAIR START.

ENTRY.NAME: Catcake
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Maestria
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp, off slow, used to move up to vie, shook clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Akiane's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Blessed Assurance
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, roused 4w, late run for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Box of Pictures
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with field, back off pace, closer 4w 1/4, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Country Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Elite Thoroughbred Racing LLC and Respect the Valleys LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: unprepared start, off slow,used, vied 3w, declared non starter

ENTRY.NAME: Sienna Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace between horses, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAYOFF CYCLE cleared soon after the start, set a soft and unpressured pace, remained clear through the lane under a steady hand ride to win ridden out. PLENTY OF CENTS closest to the winner after breaking in good order, continued to pursue that one through the second turn while being asked, minimal gain on the winner late, narrowly lasted for the place. WHEELS TURNING raced in mid pack and off the inside, came four wide for the drive, rallied on the outside to narrowly miss the place. IDE LIKE HAWAII in the second flight outside, continued one paced, not enough late for the show. R T'S D'ORO broke awkwardly and lastly, raced well back off the pace, improved position into the lane then flattened out a bit late. SHADY STAR off slowly then was bothered at the break, recovered to move up and race within striking position for six furlongs, backed up down the lane. DEPUTY KNIGHT lacked speed, remained always back. WILDCARD GOLD off a bit slow, was always outrun. LITTLE STAR TARGET lugged in at the break, fell back, was never close while wide into the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcard Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, bothered start, moved up to chase, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Little Star Target
ENTRY.COMMENT: lugged in break, never close

ENTRY.NAME: Plenty of Cents
ENTRY.OWNER: Cooper Juan K and Thomas Otis
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, asked along 2nd, minimal gain, nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Payoff Cycle
ENTRY.OWNER: Lange I L and Credeur Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared early, soft pace, stayed clear

ENTRY.NAME: Deputy Knight
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: R T's d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkwardly and lastly, back off pace, improved, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Wheels Turning
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced in mid pack, 4w into lane, rallied outside,missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Ide Like Hawaii
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside one paced, not enough for show
